nodes.name: Heritable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throw an exception if called by any account other than the heir's.
nodes.name: onlyHeir

nodes.documentation:
@dev Use these getter functions to access the internal variables in
an inherited contract.
nodes.name: heir

nodes.documentation:
@dev Heir can pronounce the owners death. To claim the ownership, they will
have to wait for `heartbeatTimeout` seconds.
nodes.name: proclaimDeath

nodes.documentation: @dev Owner can send a heartbeat if they were mistakenly pronounced dead.
nodes.name: heartbeat

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows heir to transfer ownership only if heartbeat has timed out.
nodes.name: claimHeirOwnership

attributes.name: Heritable

attributes.documentation: @dev Throw an exception if called by any account other than the heir's.
attributes.name: onlyHeir

attributes.documentation:
@dev Use these getter functions to access the internal variables in
an inherited contract.
attributes.name: heir

attributes.documentation:
@dev Heir can pronounce the owners death. To claim the ownership, they will
have to wait for `heartbeatTimeout` seconds.
attributes.name: proclaimDeath

attributes.documentation: @dev Owner can send a heartbeat if they were mistakenly pronounced dead.
attributes.name: heartbeat

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows heir to transfer ownership only if heartbeat has timed out.
attributes.name: claimHeirOwnership

claimHeirOwnership().details: Allows heir to transfer ownership only if heartbeat has timed out.

heartbeat().details: Owner can send a heartbeat if they were mistakenly pronounced dead.

heir().details: Use these getter functions to access the internal variables in an inherited contract.

proclaimDeath().details: Heir can pronounce the owners death. To claim the ownership, they will have to wait for `heartbeatTimeout` seconds.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
